keyColor.title: Color of the module key. Left empty to use `display.color.keys`

keyWidth.title: Width of the module key. Use 0 to use `display.keyWidth`

title: JSON config
description: JSON config file for fastfetch. Usually be `~/.config/fastfetch.jsonc`

$schema.title: JSON schema URL, for JSON validation and IDE intelligence

oneOf.title: Set the source file of the logo

type.title: Set the type of the logo given

source.title: Set the source file of the logo

color.title: Overwrite a color in the logo

width.title: Set the width of the logo (in characters). Required for iTerm image protocol

height.title: Set the height of the logo (in characters). Required for iTerm image protocol

padding.title: Set the padding of the logo

top.title: Set the top padding of the logo

left.title: Set the left padding of the logo

right.title: Set the right padding of the logo

printRemaining.title: Whether to print the remaining logo, if it has more lines than modules to display

preserveAspectRadio.title: Whether to preserve the aspect ratio of the logo. Supported by iTerm image protocol

recache.title: If true, regenerate image logo cache

chafa.title: Chafa configuration. See chafa document for details

fgOnly.title: Produce character-cell output using foreground colors only

symbols.title: Specify character symbols to employ in final output

canvasMode.title: Determine how colors are used in the output. This value maps the value of enum ChafaCanvasMode.

colorSpace.title: Set color space used for quantization. This value maps the value of enum ChafaColorSpace.

ditherMode.title: Set output dither mode (No effect with 24-bit color). This value maps the value of enum ChafaDitherMode.

allowSlowOperations.title: Allow operations that can be very slow for more detailed output

multithreading.title: Use multiple threads to detect values

stat.title: Show time usage (in ms) for individual modules

escapeBedrock.title: On Bedrock Linux, whether to escape the bedrock jail

pipe.title: Whether to enable pipe mode (disable logo and all escape sequences)

playerName.title: The name of the player to use for module Media and Player. Linux only

osFile.title: Set the path to the file containing OS information. Linux only

dsForceDrm.title: Force display detection to use `/sys/class/drm`. Linux only

wmiTimeout.title: Set the timeout (ms) for WMI queries, `-1` for no timeout. Windows only

display.title: Configure how things to be displayed

showErrors.title: Print occurring errors to the console. False to ignore errored modules

disableLinewrap.title: Whether to disable line wrap during the run

hideCursor.title: Whether to hide the cursor during the run

separator.title: Set the separator between key and value

color.title: Set the color of the keys and title

oneOf.title: Set the both color of the keys and title

keys.title: Set the color of the keys

title.title: Set the color of the title

brightColor.title: Set if the keys, title and ASCII logo should be printed in bright color

keyWidth.title: Align the width of keys to number of characters, 0 to disable

binaryPrefix.title: Set the binary prefix to used when printing bytes

sizeNdigits.title: Set the number of digits to keep after the decimal point when formatting sizes

sizeMaxPrefix.title: Set the largest binary prefix to use when formatting sizes

temperatureUnit.title: Set the unit of the temperature

charElapsed.title: Set the character to use in elapsed part

charTotal.title: Set the character to use in total part

border.title: Whether to show a border around the bar

width.title: Set the width of the bar, in number of characters

percentType.title: Set the percentage output type. 1 for percentage number, 2 for bar, 3 for both, 6 for bar only, 9 for colored number

noBuffer.title: Whether to disable the stdout application buffer

library.title: Set the path of a library to load

vulkan.title: Vulkan module & fallback for GPU output

wayland.title:
Better display performance and output in wayland sessions.
Supports different refresh rates per monitor.
(Linux)

xcb.title:
X11 sessions for better display detection and faster WM detection.
The *randr ones provide multi monitor support The libxcb* ones usually have better performance.
 (Linux, FreeBSD)

xrandr.title:
X11 sessions for better display detection and faster WM detection.
The *randr ones provide multi monitor support The libxcb* ones usually have better performance.
 (Linux, FreeBSD)

x11.title:
X11 sessions for better display detection and faster WM detection.
The *randr ones provide multi monitor support The libxcb* ones usually have better performance.
 (Linux, FreeBSD)

gio.title: Needed for values that are only stored GSettings (Linux, FreeBSD)

dconf.title: Needed for values that are only stored in DConf + Fallback for GSettings (Linux, FreeBSD)

xfconf.title: Needed for XFWM theme and XFCE Terminal font (Linux, FreeBSD)

sqlite3.title: Needed for pkg & rpm package count (Linux, FreeBSD)

rpm.title: Slower fallback for rpm package count. Needed on openSUSE & old CentOS / Redhat. (Linux)

imagemagick.title: Images in terminal using sixel or kitty graphics protocol (Linux, FreeBSD, macOS)

z.title: Libz. Faster image output when using kitty graphics protocol (Linux, FreeBSD, macOS)

chafa.title: Image output as ascii art (Linux, FreeBSD, macOS)

egl.title: Needed by the OpenGL module for gl context creation (Linux, FreeBSD)

glx.title: Needed by the OpenGL module for gl context creation (Linux, FreeBSD)

osmesa.title: Needed by the OpenGL module for gl context creation (Linux, FreeBSD)

pulse.title: Pulseaudio. Used for Sound detection (Linux, FreeBSD)

ddcutil.title: Used for brightness detection of external displays (Linux)

dir.title: The directory where the battery folders are. Standard: `/sys/class/power_supply/`. Linux only

temp.title: Detect and display Battery temperature if supported

showDisconnected.title: Set if disconnected bluetooth devices should be printed

temp.title: Detect and display CPU temperature if supported

paddingLeft.title: Set the number of white spaces to print before the symbol

shell.title:
Set the shell program to execute the command text
Default: cmd for Windows, /bin/sh for *nix

text.title: Set the command text to be executed

oneOf.title: Custom
oneOf.description: Print a custom string, with or without key

key.title: Leave empty not to print the key

compactType.title: Set if all displays should be printed in one line

preciseRefreshRate.title: Set if decimal refresh rates should not be rounded into integers when printing

folders.title:
A colon (semicolon on Windows) separated list of folder paths for the disk output
Default: "/:/home" ("C:\\;D:\\ ..." on Windows)

showExternal.title: Set if external volume should be printed

showHidden.title: Set if hidden volumes should be printed

showSubvolumes.title: Set if subvolumes should be printed

showUnknown.title: Set if unknown (unable to detect sizes) volumes should be printed

temp.title: Detect and display GPU temperature if supported

forceVulkan.title: Force using vulkan to detect GPUs, which support video memory usage detection with `--allow-slow-operations`

hideType.title: Specify the type of GPUs should not be printed

compact.title: Show all IPs in one line

namePrefix.title: Show IPs with given name prefix only

showDefaultRouteOnly.title: Show ips that are used for default routing only

library.title: Set the OpenGL context creation library to use. Linux only

url.title: The URL of public IP detection server to be used. Only HTTP protocol is supported

timeout.title: Time in milliseconds to wait for the public ip server to respond

string.title: Set the string to be printed

soundType.title: Set what type of sound devices should be printed

fqdn.title: Set if the title should use fully qualified domain name

color.title: Set colors of the different part of title

user.title: Set color of the user name (left part)

at.title: Set color of the @ symbol (middle part)

host.title: Set color of the host name (right part)

timeout.title: Time in milliseconds to wait for the weather server to respond

outputFormat.title: The output weather format to be used (must be URI encoded)
